frontmatter.title: React's “Driven by Facebook” principle concerns me
frontmatter.teaser: React's “Design Principles” article gave me a rollercoaster of emotions that reminded me of Facebook's ill-fated Parse service.

frontmatter.title: 8 tips to become an effective remote developer
frontmatter.teaser: For you to evolve as a developer, you need to be a self-starter and make it a point to keep yourself active and in constant state of learning.
frontmatter.description: For you to evolve as a developer, you need to be a self-starter and make it a point to keep yourself active and in constant state of learning.
